name: librum
description: Librum is a self-hosted eBook reader and digital library manager. It allows organizing, searching, and reading ebooks directly from the browser, with support for multiple formats and synced reading progress.
features: eBook Reader: Multi-format support, Browser-based reading, Synced progress. Read ebooks anywhere.
Library Management: Organize books, Search and filter, Metadata management. Build your digital library.
Reading Features: Bookmarks, Annotations, Customizable display. Comfortable reading experience.
Cross-Device Sync: Reading progress sync, Cloud storage, Multi-device access. Continue reading on any device.
